name: Banking Regulations P3 (Bonds to Bank)
description:
This law establishes banking and financial institution regulations for the Federal Bank. This is part 3 of 3 - these parts should be used together. The Minister of Finance has oversight and authority over the Federal Bank Matters. The MoF sets the interest rates. All interest rates are variable and subject to change. Individual aspects of this law are not guaranteed if not implemented by the Minister of Finance.

To Implement:
1) Create the following currencies, you will need 9 Mints: Savings Note, High Yield Savings Note, General Bond, Educational Bond, Meteor Protection Bond, Cultural Bond, Infrastructural Bond, Loan Notes, and Credit Score.
2) Create the following bank accounts: Federal Bank Main Account, Federal Bank Interest Rates, Bond Tracker, and Bond Repayment.
3) The Interest rates are controlled by sending the desired daily percentage rate of the additional currencies (except the Credit Score) to the "Federal Bank Interest Rates" account.
4) This law uses the currency exchange, which handles the savings, high yield savings, loans, and bonds - these should move in and out of the Federal Bank Main Account. Duplicates can be placed in towns or countries at the request of the local authority. The exchange must be on a federal claim stake owned by the Minister of Finance.
5) Various attributes of this law can be adjusted and should be reviewed by Parliament prior to passing. 

Credits: Author Valfreya, based on idea by SirDoder, Testers: Nuura, Weylin, PandaDono

properties.Title: Minister of Finance Bond Purchase
properties.UserDescription: This article allows the Minister of Finance to purchase the bonds issued to the public.

value.name: The Federation of White Tiger Treasury

properties.Title: Bond Automatic Repayment (To Bank)
properties.UserDescription:
This article covers automatic bond repayment when the bank bought the bonds.

Parliamentry values:
Minimum Payment: 100
Minimum Payment 2%
Time interval: once per day (if changing this value, also need to adjust frequency of interest rate in the payment)

properties.Title: PM Manual Bond Repayment to the Bank
properties.UserDescription: This article processes manual repayment of bonds paid by the bank.
